entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
